import React, {useState} from "react"; import {ToDoTasksTable} from '../features/ToDoTasks/ToDoTasksTable' import categoryPicker, {CategoryPicker} from '../app/categoryPicker' export default class ToDoIndex extends React.Component{ constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { categoryId: null }; } setCategoryId = (Id) => { this.setState({ categoryId: Id }) } render(){ return( <>
